unnormalised: Arre bhai, did you link your PAN card no. with Aadhaar yet? Last date is 31/03/2024, warna your ITR will have issues, and GSTIN might get cancelled too!
normalised: Arre bhai, did you link your P-A-N card number with Aadhaar yet? Last date is thirty first march two thousand and twenty four, warna your I-T-R will have issues, and G-S-T-I-N might get cancelled too!
